messages.title: Focus on Sport
messages.content: We are rich in sports that will benefit from a new full-size all weather pitch which John is trying to secure for local schools and the wider community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Asserting that the economy is in freefall with rising debts and crumbling UK economy, the leaflet emphasizes the need for urgent action.
Campaigning for troops who feel shockingly let down by the government, including demanding a public inquiry for the troops to get the compensation they deserve.

mentions.candidate: John is also making great strides in working with our schools – with the aim of becoming the greenest school in Manchester.

issues.economy: The economy is in freefall with rising debts and crumbling UK economy.
issues.education: John is trying to secure for local schools a new full-size all weather pitch.
issues.environment: John is making great strides in working with schools for the aim of becoming the greenest school in Manchester.

politicalExperience.achievements: Has helped more than 10,000 people with their problems and issues.

contactInformation.address: FREPOST RSBB-XRZT-ZGZY, Lib Dems, Manchester, M20 2ZB
